intro: Lopherina, commonly known as the "scented fern," is a genus of flowering plants in the family Araliaceae. Lopherina species often thrive in moist, shaded environments, making them popular in ornamental horticulture. Its unique appearance and pleasant aroma make it a valuable addition to both gardens and indoor spaces.
